text: Sainte-Suzanne-et-Chammes is a commune of 1,280 people (2017). It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Mayenne department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Sainte-Suzanne (the seat) and Chammes.Arrêté préfectoral 10 October 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Mayenne
title: Sainte-Suzanne-et-Chammes
